title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Tips On Using New IRS 990 Data
description: Instructions and tips from Andrea Fuller and Todd Wallack on using the newly available IRS 990 data, including information on data sources, downloading the files, understanding the tags, and potential pitfalls.
